text: Stixisde Loureiro J (1790) Fl. Cochinch.: 295. is a South-East Asian genus of plants in the order Brassicales; they are typically lianas.Flora of China: Stixis This genus has previously been placed in the Stixaceae (now obsolete) and Capparaceae, but under the APG IV system is now included in the family Resedaceae. ==Species== Plants of the World Online (POWO) includes the following accepted species: * Stixis hookeri Baill. * Stixis obtusifolia (Hook.f. & Thomson) Baill. * Stixis ovata (Korth.) Hallier f. * Stixis philippinensis (Turcz.) Merr. * Stixis scandens Lour. – type species * Stixis scortechinii (King) M.Jacobs * Stixis suaveolens (Roxb.) Baill. ==References== == External Links== * Category:Resedaceae Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Flora of Malesia Category:Brassicales genera
title: Stixis (plant)
